alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:55PM EDT until March 31 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LAKE AND NORTHERN ASHTABULA COUNTIES... At 1054 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ashtabula, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Austinburg, Kingsville, Edgewood, Kelloggsville, Plymouth Center and North Madison. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
